hero.name: Rizqiansyah Ramadhan.
hero.bio: Software Engineering student specializing in backend development, experienced in building and managing APIs using Express, NestJS, Flask, and Laravel, as well as proficient in database management such as MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL. Ready to contribute to impactful projects.

aboutMe.paragraph1: A Software Engineering student currently pursuing education at Global Institute Technology And Business, specializing in backend development. I have experience in building and managing APIs using various backend frameworks such as Express, NestJS, Flask, and Laravel.
aboutMe.paragraph2: Proficient in database management using MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, and Firebase. Possess a strong understanding of frontend concepts and workflows for effective API integration.
aboutMe.quote: Always eager to learn and contribute to impactful projects.
